name: APC | AOS | Security | Authentication | Login (SYSLOG)
description: System: Console user 'admin' logged in from 192.168.220.54. 0x0014

patterns.value_re: System: Console user '(?P<user>.+?)' logged in from (?P<ip>\S+). 0x0014

name: APC | AOS | Security | Authentication | Logout #1 (SYSLOG)
description: System: Console user 'admin' logged out from 192.168.220.54. 0x001E

patterns.value_re: System: Console user '(?P<user>.+?)' logged out from (?P<ip>\S+). 0x001E

name: APC | AOS | Security | Authentication | SNMP Authentication Failure (SYSLOG)
description: System: Detected an unauthorized user attempting to access the SNMP interface. 0x0004

patterns.value_re: System: Detected an unauthorized user attempting to access the SNMP interface. 0x0004

name: APC | AOS | Security | Authentication | Login Failed (SYSLOG)
description: System: Detected an unauthorized user attempting to access the Web interface from 10.111.0.18. 0x0006

patterns.value_re: System: Detected an unauthorized user attempting to access the \S+ interface from (?P<ip>\S+)\. 0x0006

name: APC | AOS | Security | Authentication | Login Failed (SNMP)

patterns.value_re: System: Detected an unauthorized user attempting to access the \S+ interface from (?P<ip>\S+)\.
